title: Just flew in from the Lou
body:
And boy are my arms tired. I tell you, loading and unloading 35mm projection equipment WHILE you're sick is no fun at all. No sir.

I'm off to go make out with the projector now.
author: Dan

comments.author: Aaron
comments.body: The Lou? Like the Pisser? The John? C'mon â€“ be more specific.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Good deal! Do you have anything with which to test it? Maybe you should display it in some way at First Friday so tht me might all gaze upon it in awe and anticipation...perhaps have it on a pedestal in the middle of a darkened, unfinished auditorium with a single spot light shining on it...

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: ...and how `bout a phlog with a few pix, making sure to clean it up, of course after your taking advantage of the poor thing right after being uprooted from it's home and moved to a totally alien situation...you sick #*@&%

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
the lou is always st. louis... even if you live in boman montana..... 

you cant make out with it.. if youre sick..
you might be contagious

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body: ps. boman is always bozeman.. even if you live in springfield, mo

comments.author: nicholas
comments.body: I hear you can buy old 35mm porn reels real cheap...
